t_audio_library::tip_collection::tips[22: Ask hard questions, but remember to be polite. A polite request will go a long way.
t_audio_library::tip_collection::tips[23: Courtesy can help establish trust and improve your interviews.
t_audio_library::tip_collection::tips[14: Even if time is limited, make a plan, do not shoot everything you see.
t_audio_library::tip_collection::tips[2]: Do some research before the interview when possible. You will ask better, more relevant questions.
t_audio_library::title: Make an Audio Story
t_audio_library::tip_collection::tips[3]: Have a one-sentence explanation of your story for your characters.
t_audio_library::tip_collection::tips[15: When recording an interview, prepare at least 15 questions.
t_audio_library::tip_collection::tips[4]: Save sensitive questions for the end.
t_audio_library::tip_collection::tips[5]: Prioritize your questions and identify the single, most essential bit of information you need.
t_audio_library::tip_collection::tips[28: Use follow-up questions if you need more information.
t_audio_library::tip_collection::tips[0]: Know yourself, be aware of your biases don't let them influence how you portray your story.
t_audio_library::tip_collection::tips[1]: When shooting in dangerous situations always have an exit strategy.
t_audio_library::tip_collection::tips[33: Ask yourself for every clip: does it tell me something new?
t_audio_library::tip_collection::tips[32: A climax is the answer on the question that keeps your listener listening. Don't give it away too early.
t_audio_library::tip_collection::tips[12: Use your own voice as little as possible, tell the story through the voices of others.
t_audio_library::tip_collection::tips[34: A good series should be made up of five strong images. If you have more good shots, add them in though.
t_audio_library::tip_collection::tips[13: Think about the audience you want to reach when considering what Topic and Format to use.
t_audio_library::tip_collection::tips[16: Focus on a single primary topic to tell a concise and clear story.
t_audio_library::tip_collection::tips[29: Remember, without good sound your images only tell half the story.
t_audio_library::tip_collection::tips[31: Every story has a major question. What's the question you've answered at the end of your item?
t_audio_library::tip_collection::tips[30: If it is windy, point your camera away from the wind, or protect your mic.
t_audio_library::quiz_card_topic::choice: A Day in the Life Story
t_audio_library::tip_collection::tips[24: Listen for background noise that may harm the quality of your story before you click record.
t_audio_library::tip_collection::tips[10: Hit record before you ask a question to record a few seconds of silence before speaking.
t_audio_library::tip_collection::tips[8]: Your story will be more interesting if you interview characters with opposing viewpoints.
t_audio_library::quiz_card_topic::questi: Choose the story you want to make.
t_audio_library::tip_collection::tips[25: Don't ask 'closed' questions that can be answered in one word such as 'yes' or 'no'.
t_audio_library::tip_collection::tips[17: Record first hand observations and interviews whenever possible.
t_audio_library::tip_collection::tips[20: Always know what you want from the interview.
t_audio_library::tip_collection::tips[21: Ask only one question at a time.
t_audio_library::tip_collection::tips[6]: Get to the most important question quickly in the interview.
t_audio_library::tip_collection::tips[11: Check your audio level using headphones before you start recording.
t_audio_library::tip_collection::tips[26: Keep the conversation moving. Ask: Why? What happened next? What do you mean?
t_audio_library::tip_collection::tips[27: If your questions do not provide a satisfactory answer, change your approach.
t_audio_library::tip_collection::tips[19: Be calm. Relaxing will help your interview subject relax too.
t_audio_library::tip_collection::tips[18: Be clear about your topic or goal when requesting an interview.
t_audio_library::text_card_0::text: Making a great audio story involves a variety of clips. These templates will guide you to get all the clips you need to tell a variety of stories.
t_audio_library::tip_collection::tips[9]: Shoot different size shots to create an effective sequence.
t_audio_library::tip_collection::tips[7]: In your interview, remember to be tough but fair.
